result.description: Deliverable about scaling will consists in a report containing all of the analytical results obtained from the characterization of scaling by X ray diffraction optical microscopy scanning electron microscopy coupled with EDX and Raman analyses Failure of this part might be due to the lack of scaling that would be a very good point for the tested power plants
